Info.Description: Reduces the number of distinct colors or tones in the image. The result is a more stylized, abstract look similar to a poster or pop art, hence the name 'posterize'.

Properties.Name: Level
Properties.Summary: Adjusts the number of color levels for each channel in the image. A lower value will decrease the number of tones, leading to a more stark, graphic effect. Conversely, a higher value increases the number of tones, resulting in a more subtle posterization effect.
